text: The Recorder of Deeds of the District of Columbia is authorized to make regulations and prescribe forms for the filing of labels, trademarks, or other distinctive marks under the provisions of this subchapter.
historical:

subchapter.text: Registration of Containers for Beverages Composed Principally of Milk.

heading.catch_text: Recorder of Deeds to make regulations.
